Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory670.jpg'}
{3: 'Evening lights come on, and the fireworks show outside the garden square draws couples eager to watch the spectacle.'}
{3: 'In a corner of the garden square, a lone white mechanoid sits on a bench, staring at the canvas in front of it.'}
{2: 'Found you.', 3: '6', 4: '(Approach quietly)', 5: '6'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Aren't you going to watch the fireworks?", 3: '9'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "I'm studying these; please, take a look.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The brown linen is covered in unsightly graffiti—random scrawls and signatures clutter every inch.'}
{2: 'It looks like a graffiti wall.', 3: '13'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'All these markings are left here by human visitors.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'According to my research, in the Golden Age, public spaces often included similar walls where people could leave their graffiti.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Even though most of these drawings aren't about technique, they express what the creators feel while putting pen to wall.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'It reminds me of my own "record," which you recommend—using painting to capture each day as it happens.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'But based on my calculations, there\'s almost a 100% chance that any tourist who leaves graffiti never sees that "record" again in their life.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'I\'m not entirely sure I follow. What\'s the real point of creating this "record" then?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Maybe it\'s just a way of telling everyone, "I was here."', 3: '21', 4: "Perhaps they're simply expressing their own joy.", 5: '21'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "So, are you suggesting they're expressing themselves to other people?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You sit beside Haicma, taking in the scattered graffiti across the canvas. Most appear in pairs, and some even have hearts circling the names.'}
{2: 'Maybe not just themselves, their company as well.', 3: '25'}
{2: 'Should we leave something together?', 3: '28'}
{3: 'Seeing you place the palette on your lap, the mechanoid gives a slight smile.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "All right. I'll do it with you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The distant chatter and laughter remain just as lively, while you are busy mixing paints on the bench, wondering where to place the very first stroke.'}
{3: 'But as soon as Haicma finishes blending the colors and raises the brush, her arm suddenly stalls in midair.'}
{3: "Time slips away. By the time twilight's last glow vanishes, you have already planned the painting, but Haicma still hasn't touched the canvas."}
{2: "Can't think of anything?", 3: '36'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: 'No—there are too many possibilities. I have no idea how to choose.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "I'm aiming for a piece that really stands out, but every approach I've considered predicts almost the same result.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't worry about the outcome.", 3: '41'}
{2: 'Just paint what feels right in this moment.', 3: '42'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'What feels right in this moment...', 4: '1'}
{2: "(Gently take hold of Haicma's brush-wielding hand)", 3: '44'}
{3: 'You apply gentle pressure, holding the brush steady as Haicma and you lay down the first stroke of color.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Your palm feels so warm... just like I remember.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanoid stops hesitating and focuses completely on painting.'}
{3: 'The brush glides precisely between the graffiti lines, and soon a brilliant lily takes shape on the canvas.'}
{3: 'Its petals, so clearly defined, rest gracefully while the once-chaotic scribbles now shine like morning dew...'}
{3: "They're not covered up; instead, they highlight the petals and become part of the lily painting."}
{3: "Every ounce of joy and every memory on this canvas bursts into vibrant color under the mechanoid's brush."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Commandant, how does the painting look?', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's really impressive.", 3: '58', 4: "You're definitely pushing creative boundaries.", 5: '58'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'I turn off my data analysis module and let my thoughts wander... what kind of creation can truly "record" the moments we share.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg'}
{3: 'A single firework streaks across the night sky, bursting with brilliant light among the stars.'}
{3: 'As you tilt your head back, Haicma notices the smudges of paint on your face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: "It seems you've been a bit careless while painting. Make sure you keep your face a safe distance from the canvas.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Haicma reaches out, gently wiping the paint off your cheek with a fingertip.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'I see your silhouette, and I recall that ancient legend.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Even though Lyra α and Aquila α rarely align, everyone still believes that, just like in the myth, the cowherd and the weaver girl will reunite on the day of the Double Seventh Festival.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Do you remember? I once wished that on this exact day every year, we'd have a 100% chance of meeting.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Even if the odds are slim, you always show up right by my side.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Just like the legend says—across the Heavenly River and through the Magpie Bridge...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Haicma gazes at the Milky Way, watching bursts of fireworks light up the night sky like a living masterpiece.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Light from millions of years ago mingles with the fireworks overhead, bathing everything in brilliant color.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: "The air grows chilly, so I switch on the temperature control. If you don't mind, please move a bit closer.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Tonight, I still have many questions I want to ask you...', 4: '1'}
